filter.inkscape:menu-tooltip: Darkens the edge with an inner blur and adds a flexible glow
filter.inkscape:label: Dark And Glow

text.tspan: Make sure the Vectrex is switched off.
Insert the Karl Quappe cartridge into the Vectrex
Select Karl Quappe from the menu.
Select Karl Quappe from the menu.
After the initial bootup screen of Vectrex keep
any button pressed until the Karl Quappe title
(to skip over code, which interferes with PB6 based
